attributes.long-description:
Save Danville from the devious Dr. Doof.

Phineas and Ferb bring their joyful blend of laughter and chaos to PlayStation®Vita in a brand new adventure you won’t find anywhere else.

Hold on to your hat as Phineas, Ferb and Perry the Platypus – also known as Agent P – battle Dr. Doofenshmirtz and an army of angry home appliances across the city of Danville and far beyond.

• Play as Phineas, Ferb and Agent P from the smash-hit Disney TV show in an all-new story.
• Use the clever controls of your 'PS Vita' system to lead the boys on an adventure filled with laughs, puzzles and gadgets.
• Explore five action-packed locations and discover secret areas to find hidden treasures.

Find out more about Phineas and Ferb: Day of Doofenshmirtz over at playstation.com.

Gameplay requires PlayStation®Vita memory card (sold separately)

1 player(s)
1024KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Rear Camera
Motion Sensor

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.

© 2015 Disney. Developed by Virtual Toys.
attributes.name: Phineas and Ferb: Day of Doofenshmirtz
